title: Liar
desc:
Post 208
- When played, this card goes into your Identity zone.
- While in your Identity, you can play a cards you do not have. Players can call out your bluff if they think you're playing cards you don't own.
- If a player calls your bluff successfully, you draw 3 cards. If a player calls a bluff but you played a real card, they draw 1 instead.
